name: UnifiedAttribute
description: A unified attribute for the Polygon Checkbox

content.name: x
content.description:
the X position of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: y
content.description:
the Y position of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: angle
content.description:
the angle of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: outer_points
content.description:
the points of a HyperPolygon representing the outer points of the checkbox
default: a default HyperPolygon

content.name: inner_points
content.description:
the points of a HyperPolygon representing the inner points of the checkbox
default: a default HyperPolygon

content.name: style__check
content.description:
the style of the checkbox check mark when it is checked
default: {r:0.58, g:0.58, b:0.58, a:1.0}

content.name: style__uncheck
content.description:
the style of the checkbox check mark when it is not checked
default: {r:0.0, g:0.0, b:0.0, a:0.0}

content.name: style__backing
content.description:
the style of the checkbox background HyperPolygon
default: {r:0.78, g:0.78, b:0.78, a:1.0}

content.name: style__check_glow
content.description:
the style of the checkbox check mark when it is checked and glowing
default: {r:0.86, g:0.86, b:0.86, a:1.0}

content.name: style__uncheck_glow
content.description:
the style of the checkbox check mark when it is not checked and glowing
default: {r:0.0, g:0.0, b:0.0, a:0.0}

content.name: style__backing_glow
content.description:
the style of the checkbox background HyperPolygon when glowing
default: {r:0.86, g:0.86, b:0.86, a:1.0}
